Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Lakers host the Minnesota Timberwolves in the season opener.
BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Timberwolves -1.5; over/under is 223
The Lakers averaged 7.4 steals, 5.5 blocks and 13.4 turnovers per game last season.
The Timberwolves averaged 113.0 points per game last season, 17.8 on free throws and 37.8 from 3-point range.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Los Angeles finished 47-35 overall, 27-25 in Western Conference action and 28-14 at home during the 2023-24 season.
Minnesota finished 56-26 overall and 37-15 in Western Conference play during the 2023-24 season.
INJURIES: Lakers: Jarred Vanderbilt: out (foot), Christian Wood: out (knee).
